Interrogator: Okay. So what did the man do after waking up?
Interrogee: So after waking her man puked beside the bed, and then he started watching the television.

Interrogator: Okay, so while he was watching the television, why did the woman scream?
Interrogee: So a woman came screaming out of the bedroom stating that it is gross that you puke beside the bed, and she was screaming because she wanted her money for her services as she was a prostitute.

Interrogator: So what was the man's reaction to women's behavior?
Interrogee: So man completely ignored the woman, and he was utterly focusing on the television, and there was a commercial about a cereal named Comrade Crunch going on that the man was focusing on.

Interrogator: So what was the reaction of the man after seeing the advertisement of cereal?
Interrogee: After seeing that advertisement, the man who started reminiscing about his childhood and how we used to have that cereal as breakfast, and then he went into his kitchen and started searching for the same cereal.

Interrogator: So did the woman feel that the man had been ignoring her?
Interrogee: Yes, the woman was continuously threatening the man to give her her money, or else, if she will call her man, and he will beat him. And she was also stating that the other girls are waiting for her, and that he should hurry up and pay her money.

Interrogator: Did the man pay the woman?
Interrogee: No, the man was continuously ignoring the woman. And when the man saw the commercial, he went into his kitchen to search for the cereal, and he found the cereal, but the milk was expired. So he told the woman that he is going to the market to get the milk.

Interrogator: Okay, so while going to the market, did you observe something out of the place?
Interrogee: Yes, while going to the market, the man observed that a white car bumped into the sidewalk, and a couple stepped out of the car fighting about something. And then a bald man in a brown hoodie came rushing toward the woman, snatched the woman's purse, and started running, and then the woman started chasing.

Interrogator: So you saw a lot of crime happening in the neighborhood.
Interrogee: Yes, there was a lot of crime.

Interrogator: So in the local store, what happened?
Interrogee: So at the local store, the man, Victor, went into the section where the milk was. He tasted some milk, and then he picked up another bottle of milk, and as he was going to get his milk, a man in a white shirt and spectacles came into the shop and pointed a gun at the receptionist, demanding drugs. But the receptionist stated that this is not a pharmacy, and we don't have any drugs. We only have cash. And then the robber agreed, stating that I will take the cash. Then Victor reminded him that he's in a hurry and wants to get his items billed, and he should step aside. But the man in the white shirt pointed the gun at Victor. Victor snatched the gun, and he shot the man in the leg. Then the receptionist refused to take money from him, and Victor threw some money at the receptionist and left the shop with milk.

Interrogator: So when Victor went back to his house, what did he observe?
Interrogee: On going back to his house, he saw that a black man about six foot two or more inches was in the house beside the woman he left earlier in the house, and he was eating his cereal. And that made Victor furious.

Interrogator: So what was Victor's behavior towards the man?
Interrogee: So after seeing that man, Victor became really furious, and he started thrashing the man. He punched the man multiple times in the face, and then he threw money at the man, stating that this is your money now, take it and leave.

So this man was the people of the woman, the prostitute who was in the house, and she called him, and he was there to collect the money. And Victor thrashed him really bad. He hit him multiple times with his fist on his face, and the man was bleeding on the floor.

Interrogator: Okay, so do you think that the man was killed by Victor?
Interrogee: No, the man was still alive.

Interrogator: Okay. So after knocking that man out, what did Victor do?
Interrogee: After knocking out that man, Victor went back to the store as now he was out of the cereal, so he goes back to the store to get the cereal and milk.

Interrogator: When he went back to the store. What happened? How did he die?
Interrogee: So on his way back to the store, he saw the man in the brown hoodie getting thrashed with a basketball bat, the man he shot earlier in a police car, and on entering the store, he saw two policemen taking the statements of the receptionist. And when he was taking the cereal from the cereal section, the receptionist pointed at him, informing the police officers that this is the same man they were searching for, then the police officers pointed their guns at him, asking him to surrender. Then Victor refused, and the police officer started shooting him, and one of the police officers shot him, then Victor shot back at the police officers with the gun he took from the man in the white shirt earlier. And then later, Victor died because one of the gunshots had hit his chest.

Interrogator: Okay, so after dying, did the policeman realize the mistake?
Interrogee: No after Victor died, policemen were happy as they managed to kill the gangster.

Interrogator: Do you think Victor was innocent?
Interrogee: Victor was Victor was, as the police officer stated, Victor was a huge criminal, and so he wasn't innocent, and he shot a man earlier, and he was firing at the police officers as well.
